title: Episode #369:  Mike Gravel And Acts Of Civil Disobedience
description:
We are replaying an interview we had six years ago with Mike Gravel, the former Alaska senator who died this week, about his decision to read excerpts of the Pentagon Papers on the Senate floor.

The post Episode #369: Mike Gravel And Acts Of Civil Disobedience appeared first on Ken Rudin's Political Junkie.
itunes:subtitle: We are replaying an interview we had six years ago with Mike Gravel, the former Alaska senator who died this week, about his decision to read excerpts of the Pentagon Papers on the Senate floor.
itunes:summary: Mike Gravel, the former Alaska senator who read excerpts of the Pentagon Papers on the Senate floor in 1971, died this week at the age of 91.Â  Back in 2015, Gravel was on the Political Junkie talking about his fateful act, and we are replaying that interview this week.
itunes:author: Ken Rudin
itunes:title: Mike Gravel and Acts of Civil Disobedience
